Our project is advancing three research areas to create a new sustainable aquaculture feed toolbox:

1\) Spatial mapping of global environmental pressures and impacts

2\) Predictive modelling of local ecosystem impacts

3\) Future scenario projections to assess trade-offs across sustainable development goals
